pages.title: Higher Essences
pages.text: Now that you have gathered some Lesser Soul Essences, you can craft higher essences. Remember, that more powerful magic will require more soul essences.

pages.title: Greater Essence
pages.text: By combining 9 Lesser Soul Essences, you can get yourself a single $(d)Greater Soul Essence (Depleted)$().

pages.title: Blessed Essence
pages.text: By combining 9 Greater Soul Essences, you can get yourself a single $(d)Blessed Soul Essence (Depleted)$().

pages.title: Depletion?
pages.text: Notice that both of these recipes yield essences that are depleted of any magical properties. In order to recharge these essences, try preforming an $(d)Essence Ritual$().
